title: Thank you
comment: This is the one app I always have on this poor ole dinosaur of a phone. Great play, no ads or special permissions, and reliable! Thanks, Alexei.

title: Good Mahjong solitaire
comment: It's pretty much like the GNOME Mahjong solitaire game, which is exactly what I was looking for. No ads, and it scales perfectly to my 960x540 qHD screen, so that's a plus as well. The only problem is that the edges of the tiles aren't very easy to see, so it's hard to tell what can and can't be played. Zooming helps, but I'd like to not have to do that. Or possibly, if unplayable tiles were slightly dimmed or playable tiles (I don't mean matchable ones, just all that would be playable) had a little glow to them. Easy 5 stars if that were the case.
